pullRequest.title: Restructure jballerina runtime and toolkit distribution
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Restructure the microgateway toolkit and runtime distribution.
Issues
#943
Automation tests

Unit tests added: No
Integration tests added: No

Tested environments

MacOS Mojave

Maintainers: Check before merge

 Assigned 'Type' label
 Assigned the project
 Validated respective github issues
 Assigned milestone to the github issue(s)
